title: "Mo Chen – AI to Create Safe and Practical Robotics"
excerpt: "Simon Fraser University’s School of Computing Science professor Mo Chen is developing artificial intelligence systems that can more efficiently and safely collect larger volumes of data. The goal is to improve virtual simulations of everyday scenarios with applications for a variety of human-centred autonomous agents including autonomous cars,"
